signatures.name: div(integer, integer) integer
signatures.doc: Calculates division between the first number and the second. Returns integer quotient of division.

signatures.name: div(number, number) number
signatures.doc: Calculates division between the first number and the second. Returns number quotient of division.

signatures.name: mod(integer, integer) integer
signatures.doc: Calculates remainder of division the first number and the second. Returns integer remainder of division.

signatures.name: mod(number, number) number
signatures.doc: Calculates remainder of division the first number and the second. Returns number remainder of division.

signatures.name: mul(vararg integer) integer
signatures.doc: Calculates multiplication between argument values. Returns integer result of multiplication.

signatures.name: mul(vararg number) number
signatures.doc: Calculates multiplication between argument values. Returns number result of multiplication.

signatures.name: sub(vararg integer) integer
signatures.doc: Calculates subtraction between argument values. Returns integer result of subtraction.

signatures.name: sub(vararg number) number
signatures.doc: Calculates subtraction between argument values. Returns number result of subtraction.

signatures.name: sum(vararg integer) integer
signatures.doc: Calculates sum between argument values. Returns integer result of sum.

signatures.name: sum(vararg number) number
signatures.doc: Calculates sum between argument values. Returns number result of sum.

signatures.name: maxInteger() integer
signatures.doc: Gets max value of integer type. Returns max integer value.

signatures.name: maxNumber() number
signatures.doc: Gets max value of number type. Returns max number value.

signatures.name: minInteger() integer
signatures.doc: Gets min value of integer type. Returns min integer value.

signatures.name: minNumber() number
signatures.doc: Gets min value of number type. Returns min number value.

signatures.name: max(vararg integer) integer
signatures.doc: Gets max value of argument values. Returns max integer value.

signatures.name: max(vararg number) number
signatures.doc: Gets max value of argument values. Returns max number value.

signatures.name: min(vararg integer) integer
signatures.doc: Gets min value of argument values. Returns min integer value.

signatures.name: min(vararg number) number
signatures.doc: Gets min value of argument values. Returns min number value.

signatures.name: abs(integer) integer
signatures.doc: Gets absolute value of argument. Returns integer value.

signatures.name: abs(number) number
signatures.doc: Gets absolute value of argument. Returns number value.

signatures.name: signum(integer) integer
signatures.doc: Gets sign value from argument. Returns -1 if value is negative, 0 if value is equal to 0, 1 if value is positive.

arguments.doc: Integer value to get sign value.

signatures.name: signum(number) number
signatures.doc: Gets sign value from argument. Returns -1.0 if value is negative, 0.0 if value is equal to 0, 1.0 if value is positive.

arguments.doc: Number value to get sign value.

signatures.name: round(number) number
signatures.doc: Rounds argument value to the closest integer value. 1.49 -> 1.0, 1.5 -> 2.0. Returns number value.

signatures.name: floor(number) number
signatures.doc: Rounds argument value down. 1.49 -> 1.0, 1.5 -> 1.0. Returns number value.

signatures.name: ceil(number) number
signatures.doc: Round argument value up. 1.49 -> 2.0, 1.5 -> 2.0. Returns number value.

signatures.name: copySign(integer, integer) integer
signatures.doc: Gets value of first argument with sign of the second argument. Returns integer value.

arguments.doc: Integer value to copy value from.
Integer value to copy sign from.

signatures.name: copySign(number, number) number
signatures.doc: Gets value of first argument with sign of the second argument. Returns number value.

arguments.doc: Number value to copy value from.
Number value to copy sign from.
